scripts.test:chrome:laptop:v1: cross-env APP_VERSION=V1 LAPTOP=true wdio src/resources/config/wdio.chrome.conf.js --spec test/TraditionalTestsV1.spec.ts
scripts.test:chrome:tablet:v1: cross-env APP_VERSION=V1 TABLET=true wdio src/resources/config/wdio.chrome.conf.js --spec test/TraditionalTestsV1.spec.ts
scripts.test:firefox:laptop:v1: cross-env APP_VERSION=V1 LAPTOP=true wdio src/resources/config/wdio.firefox.conf.js --spec test/TraditionalTestsV1.spec.ts
scripts.test:firefox:tablet:v1: cross-env APP_VERSION=V1 TABLET=true wdio src/resources/config/wdio.firefox.conf.js --spec test/TraditionalTestsV1.spec.ts
scripts.test:edge:laptop:v1: cross-env APP_VERSION=V1 LAPTOP=true wdio src/resources/config/wdio.edge.conf.js --spec test/TraditionalTestsV1.spec.ts
scripts.test:edge:tablet:v1: cross-env APP_VERSION=V1 TABLET=true wdio src/resources/config/wdio.edge.conf.js --spec test/TraditionalTestsV1.spec.ts
scripts.test:chrome:mobile:v1: cross-env APP_VERSION=V1 MOBILE=true wdio src/resources/config/wdio.chrome.conf.js --spec test/TraditionalTestsV1.spec.ts
scripts.test:v1: npm run test:chrome:laptop:v1 && npm run test:chrome:tablet:v1 && npm run test:firefox:laptop:v1 && npm run test:firefox:tablet:v1 && npm run test:edge:laptop:v1 && npm run test:edge:tablet:v1 && npm run test:chrome:mobile:v1
scripts.test:visual:v1: cross-env APP_VERSION=V1 VISUAL=true wdio wdio.conf.js --spec test/ModernTestsV1.spec.ts
scripts.test:visual:v2: cross-env APP_VERSION=V2 VISUAL=true wdio wdio.conf.js --spec test/ModernTestsV2.spec.ts
